publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3082 Euan Robson: The Draft Marriage (Approval of Places) (Scotland) Regulations 2002-That the Local Government Committee recommends that the draft Marriage (Approval of Places) (Scotland) Regulations 2002 be approved. Supported by: Mr Jim Wallace*
